summary: A suite of unit tests that validate the behavior of AWS IVS channel management operations using a mocked AWS environment. The tests cover creating channels with default and custom parameters, retrieving existing and nonâ€‘existent channels, listing channels with various filters and pagination, updating channel attributes, and deleting channels while handling expected client errors.
business_intent: To guarantee reliable integration with the Amazon Interactive Video Service by confirming that channel lifecycle actions perform correctly and handle edge cases, thereby supporting applications that rely on live video streaming infrastructure.
